summary.span: 在不回发的情况下允许部分呈现页的各部分。

span.span: Enables sections of a page to be partially rendered without a postback.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [刷新 UpdatePanel 内容Refreshing UpdatePanel Content](#refreshing_updatepanel_content) - [UpdatePanel 使用情况UpdatePanel Usage](#updatepanel_usage) - [应用样式Applying Styles](#applying_styles) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是 ASP.NET 中 AJAX 功能的核心部分。 controls are a central part of AJAX functionality in ASP.NET. 它们用于控件以使部分页面呈现。They are used with the control to enable partial-page rendering. 当页面部分必须进行更新时，局部页面呈现减少了同步回发和完成页更新的需要。Partial-page rendering reduces the need for synchronous postbacks and complete page updates when only part of the page has to be updated. 在局部页面呈现提升的用户体验，因为它减少了整页回发期间发生，并提高 Web 页交互的屏幕闪烁。Partial-page rendering improves the user experience because it reduces the screen flicker that occurs during a full-page postback and improves Web page interactivity. ## 刷新 UpdatePanel 内容Refreshing UpdatePanel Content 启用部分页呈现时，控件可以执行更新整页回发或异步回发的更新的一个或多个内容控件。When partial-page rendering is enabled, a control can perform a postback that updates the whole page or an asynchronous postback that updates the content of one or more controls. 控制是否异步回发和更新会导致控件取决于以下：Whether a control causes an asynchronous postback and updates an control depends on the following: - 如果的属性控件设置为，则源自页上的每个回发将更新控件的内容。If the property of the control is set to , the control's content is updated on every postback that originates from the page. 这包括从在其他控件的异步回发控件并不是内部的控件的回发控件。This includes asynchronous postbacks from controls that are inside other controls and postbacks from controls that are not inside controls. - 如果属性设置为，则在以下情况下更新控件的内容：If the property is set to , the control's content is updated in the following circumstances: - 当您调用方法的显式控制。When you call the method of the control explicitly. - 当控件嵌套在另一个控制和父面板会更新。When the control is nested inside another control, and the parent panel is updated. - 通过使用定义为触发器的控件导致回发是时`Triggers`属性的控件。When a postback is caused by a control that is defined as a trigger by using the `Triggers` property of the control. 在此方案中，该控件显式触发面板内容的更新。In this scenario, the control explicitly triggers an update of the panel content. 该控件可以是内部或外部触发器与之关联的控件。The control can be either inside or outside the control that the trigger is associated with. - 当属性设置为`true`的子控件和控件导致回发。When the property is set to `true` and a child control of the control causes a postback. 子控件嵌套控件不会导致更新外部控件，除非将它们显式定义为触发器。Child controls of nested controls do not cause an update to the outer control unless they are explicitly defined as triggers. 设置的组合属性设置为`false`并属性设置为不允许，将引发异常。The combination of setting the property to `false` and the property to is not allowed and will throw an exception. 当控件执行的异步 post，它将添加自定义 HTTP 标头。When the control performs an asynchronous post, it adds a custom HTTP header. 某些代理中删除此自定义 HTTP 标头。Some proxies remove this custom HTTP header. 如果发生这种情况，在服务器处理的请求作为常规回发，这会导致客户端错误。If this occurs, the server handles the request as a regular postback, which causes a client error. 若要解决此问题，请在执行异步发布时插入自定义窗体字段。To resolve this issue, insert a custom form field when you perform asynchronous posts. 然后检查标头或服务器代码中的自定义窗体字段。Then check the header or the custom form field in server code. ## UpdatePanel 使用情况UpdatePanel Usage 可以使用多个独立控件来更新不同页上的区域。You can use multiple controls to update different page regions independently. 当页面包含一个或多个控件第一次呈现时，所有的所有内容都呈现和发送到浏览器控件。When the page that contains one or more controls is first rendered, all the content of all controls are rendered and sent to the browser. 在后续异步回发，每个内容控件可能不会更新，具体取决于控制面板设置和客户端或服务器逻辑的各个面板上。On subsequent asynchronous postbacks, the content of each control might not be updated depending on the panel settings and on client or server logic for individual panels. 此外可以使用控件在以下方案：You can also use controls in the following scenarios: - 在用户控件。In user controls. - 在母版页和内容页。On master and content pages. - 嵌套在其他控件。Nested inside other controls. - 内部模板化控件，如或控件。Inside templated controls such as the or controls. 以声明方式或以编程方式，可以添加控件。 controls can be added declaratively or programmatically. 您可以添加控制以编程方式，但不能以编程方式添加触发器。You can add an control programmatically, but you cannot add triggers programmatically. 若要创建类似于触发器的行为，可以为异步回发控件注册页上的控件。To create trigger-like behavior, you can register a control on the page as an asynchronous postback control. 执行此操作通过调用方法的控件。You do this by calling the method of the control. 然后可以创建事件处理程序响应异步回发，并在处理程序调用在运行方法的控件。You can then create an event handler that runs in response to the asynchronous postback, and in the handler, call the method of the control. ## 应用样式Applying Styles 控件接受 expando 属性。The control accepts expando attributes. 这样可以为控件呈现 HTMLelements 设置 CSS 类。This lets you set a CSS class for the HTMLelements that the controls render. 例如，您可以创建下面的示例中所示的标记：For example, you might create the markup shown in the following example: ``` ``` 在前面的示例标记呈现 HTML 类似于以下运行页面时：The markup in the previous example renders HTML similar to the following when the page runs: ```
``` ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 以下示例演示的不同用法控件。The following examples show different uses of the control. **UpdatePanel 控件内的控件****Controls Inside an UpdatePanel Control** 下面的示例演示如何将内部控件控制，以减少屏幕闪烁，当您发布到服务器。The following example shows how to put controls inside an control to reduce screen flicker when you post to the server. 在此示例中，和一个控件位于控件。In this example, a and a control are inside an control. 默认情况下属性是并属性是`true`。By default, the property is and the property is `true`. 因此，子控件的面板会导致异步回发。Therefore, child controls of the panel cause an asynchronous postback. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/CS/UpdatePanelExample1CS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/VB/UpdatePanelExample1VB.aspx#1)] **使用 UpdatePanel 控件的母版/详细信息方案****Master/Detail Scenario with UpdatePanel Controls** 在以下示例中，控件用于显示订单和订单从 Northwind 数据库的详细信息的母版/详细信息方案。In the following example, an control is used in a master/detail scenario that shows orders and order details from the Northwind database. 一个控件包含显示订单列表的控件。One control contains the control that displays a list of orders. 第二个控件包含控件，用于显示一个订单的详细信息。A second control contains a control that displays the details of one order. 当从第一个表中选择订单时，第二个表中显示该订单的详细信息。When you select an order from the first table, details for that order are displayed in the second table. 第二个表进行更新以异步方式基于第一个表中所选内容上。The second table is updated asynchronously based on the selection in the first table. 订单摘要表中的排序和分页操作也会导致部分更新。The sorting and paging operations in the orders summary table also cause partial updates. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/CS/UpdatePanelExample2CS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/VB/UpdatePanelExample2VB.aspx#2)] 如果将放控件内部控件，设置控件的属性设置为`true`不受支持。If you put a control inside an control, setting the control's property to `true` is not supported. 但是，由于控件支持异步回发，更改任何回发控件内部控件导致排序和分页回调的行为相同。However, because the control supports asynchronous postbacks, any postbacks that change the control inside an control cause the same behavior as sorting and paging callbacks. **在模板中使用 UpdatePanel 控件****Using an UpdatePanel Control in a Template** 在以下示例中，控件中的项模板使用控件。In the following example, an control is used in the item template of a control. 自动生成每个数据行中的控件。 controls in each data row are generated automatically. 每一行控件包含控件来显示该行中的项的数量和控件以减少，增加该数量。Each row's control contains a control to display the quantity of the item in that row and a control to decrease and increase the quantity. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/CS/UpdatePanelExample3CS.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/VB/UpdatePanelExample3VB.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 若要动态添加控制转移到一个页面，创建一个新实例，并将子控件添加到由的实例公开的控件对象属性。To dynamically add an control to a page, create a new instance and then add child controls to the control object that is exposed by the instance's property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何动态创建控制并将其添加到页面。The following example shows how to dynamically create an control and add it to a page. 当您单击的按钮内控件，该消息由已刷新的日期和时间。When you click the button inside the control, the message is refreshed with the date and time. 通过添加子控件属性。Child controls are added by using the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/CS/UpdatePanelConstructorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/VB/UpdatePanelConstructorVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含一系列可在包含它的 CSS 样式特性`div`元素的控件。The property contains a collection of CSS style attributes that can be used in the enclosing `div` element of the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示来自 控件的即时子控件的回发是否更新面板的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether postbacks from immediate child controls of an control update the panel's content.

value.span: 如果来自 控件的即时子控件的回发将更新面板的内容，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if postbacks from immediate child controls of the control update the panel's content; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性设置为`true`如果你想从的直接子控件的回发控件以使该面板的内容的更新。Set the property to `true` if you want postbacks from immediate child controls of the control to cause an update of the panel's content. 子控件嵌套控件不会导致更新父控件的内容，除非调用方法显式或作为触发器定义的子控件。Child controls of nested controls will not cause an update of the parent control's content unless you call the method explicitly or you define the child controls as triggers. > [!NOTE] > 当属性设置为并属性设置为`false`，则期间引发异常方法。When the property is set to and the property is set to `false`, an exception is thrown during the method. 不允许使用此属性的组合控件。This combination of properties is not allowed for the control. 其中可能设置的情况下到`false`时，有两个控制，并且您想要更新的第二个面板的内容，但不是更新其自己的内容的第一个面板中的回发。A scenario where you might set to `false` is when you have two controls and you want a postback from the first panel to update the content of the second panel but not update its own content. 例如，第一个面板可能是要购买的产品列表，并且第二个面板可能购物车。For example, the first panel might be a list of products to buy and the second panel might be a shopping cart.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于定义 控件内容的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template that defines the content of the control.

value.span: 一个 实例，用于定义 控件的内容。

span.span: An instance that defines the content of the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含在显示的内容控制呈现时。The property contains the content that appears inside an control when it is rendered. 您可以以声明方式或以编程方式创建模板的内容。You can create the template's content declaratively or programmatically. 内容的模板控件是单实例模板。The content template of an control is a single-instance template. 因此，它包含控件的属性可直接在页面上而无需使用方法。Therefore, the properties of the controls it contains can be accessed directly on the page without using the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. 若要将项添加到控件以声明方式中，添加``元素的开始和结束标记之间控件。To add items to the control declaratively, add an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 内部``元素标记声明其他控件和 HTML 元素。Inside the `` element tags, declare other controls and HTML elements. 若要将项添加到动态控制，请使用属性，这样就可以添加子控件，而无需创建实现的自定义模板接口。To add items to the control dynamically, use the property, which enables you to add child controls without having to create a custom template that implements the interface.

exception.span: 在创建模板实例或内容模板容器后，设置 控件的 属性。

span.span: The property of the control is set after an instance of the template is created or after the content template container is created.

related.span: ASP.NET Web 服务器控件模板

span.span: ASP.NET Web Server Controls Templates

summary.span: 获取一个可以以编程方式向其添加子控件的控件对象。

span.span: Gets a control object to which you can programmatically add child controls.

value.span: 一个定义了 控件内容的 对象。

span.span: A object that defines the content of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够以编程方式添加到的子控件而无需定义继承的自定义模板的控件接口。The property enables you to programmatically add child controls to the control without having to define a custom template that inherits from the interface. 如果要添加到的内容控制以声明方式或通过设计器中，您应将内容添加到属性使用``元素。If you are adding content to the control declaratively or through a designer, you should add content to the property by using a `` element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式指定属性的控件。The following example shows how to programmatically specify the property of an control. 的属性时设置控件`Button1`单击。The property of a control is set when `Button1` is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/CS/UpdatePanelConstructorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/VB/UpdatePanelConstructorVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets the object that contains the child controls for the control.
The collection of child controls for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性被重写基类和密封的以防止其他派生。The property is overridden from the base class and sealed to prevent additional derivation. 若要将控件添加到控件以声明方式，创建``元素内的控件标记。To add controls to the control declaratively, create a `` element inside the control markup. 若要将控件添加到以编程方式控制，请使用属性。To add controls to the control programmatically, use the property.

exception.span: 已调用 类的 、、、 或 方法。

span.span: The , , , , or method of the class has been called.

exception.span: 若要更改 控件的内容，请修改 属性的子控件。

span.span: To change the content of the control, modify the child controls of the property.

summary.span: 创建一个 对象，该对象用作定义 控件内容的子控件的容器。

span.span: Creates a object that acts as a container for child controls that define the control's content.
A container for the control's content.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法旨在用于由控件开发人员想要扩展控件。This method is intended for use by control developers who want to extend the control. 例如，在派生类中，可以提供不同的根控件，它就像一个用于在控件的内容。For example, in derived classes, you can provide a different root control that acts as a container for your control's content. 默认实现返回对象。The default implementation returns a object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写方法在自定义要始终呈现控件`
`和``面板的内容的元素。The following example shows how to override the method in a custom control to always render the `
` and `` elements for the panel's content. 自定义控件定义了一个名为的公共属性`GroupingText`，它是字符串文字``元素。The custom control defines a public property named `GroupingText` that is a string literal inside the `` element. 自定义名为控件`CustomUpdatePanel`派生自并重写方法。A custom control named `CustomUpdatePanel` derives from and overrides the method. 放置`CustomUpdatePanel`类网站的 App_Code 文件夹中的源代码。Put the `CustomUpdatePanel` class source code in the Web site's App_Code folder. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/CS/App_Code/CustomUpdatePanel.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/VB/App_Code/CustomUpdatePanel.vb#2)] 自定义页上使用控件一样控件。The custom control is used on the page just as the control is. 下面的示例显示了一个包含自定义的页面控件。The following example shows a page that contains the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/CS/UpdatePanelCreateContentTemplateContainerCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/VB/UpdatePanelCreateContentTemplateContainerVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 返回 控件中包含的所有控件的集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of all controls that are contained in the control.

returns.span: 一个 对象，该对象包含定义 控件内容的所有控件。

span.span: A object that consists of all controls that define the content of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由控件开发人员。The method is used by control developers. 此方法是受保护的和密封的因为它是继承的类可见，但它不能重写。Because this method is protected and sealed, it is visible to classes that inherit from the class, but it cannot be overridden. 此方法重写基实现返回一个专用对象，它将引发时， ， ， ，或者方法的调用类。This method overrides the base implementation to return a specialized object that throws an when the , , , , or method of the class is invoked. 若要更改 控件的内容，请修改 属性的子控件。To change the content of the control, modify the child controls of the property.

summary.span: 如果启用部分页呈现，则会初始化 控件触发器集合。

span.span: Initializes the control trigger collection if partial-page rendering is enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未启用部分页呈现，在中定义的触发器不初始化属性，因为它们不不起任何作用。If partial-page rendering is not enabled, the triggers that are defined in the property are not initialized because they have no effect. 属性的控件获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用部分页呈现。The property of the control gets or sets a value that indicates whether partial-page rendering is enabled. 属性的控件获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否支持局部页面呈现。The property of the control gets or sets a value that indicates whether partial-page rendering is supported.

para.span: 当您重写方法，请确保调用的基类，因此，如果在局部页面呈现启用注册触发器。

span.span: When you override the method, make sure to call the base class so that triggers are registered if partial-page rendering is enabled.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件的内容是否包含在 HTML 或 元素中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an control's content is enclosed in an HTML or element.
One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 ，以便面板内容包含在 HTML 元素中。

span.span: The default is so that the content of the panel is enclosed in an HTML element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果属性设置为，则内容控件呈现在 HTML 内``元素。If the property is set to , the content of an control is rendered inside an HTML `` element. 如果属性设置为，呈现在 HTML`
`元素。If the property is set to , it is rendered inside an HTML `
` element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以声明方式。The following example shows how to set the property declaratively. 名为控件`UpdatePanel1`以 html 格式呈现``元素。The control named `UpdatePanel1` is rendered in an HTML `` element. 如果属性设置为，则生成的段落便会因的方式而出现不相互连接 HTML`
`元素呈现。If the property were set to , the resulting paragraph would appear disjointed because of the way in which the HTML `
` element is rendered. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode/CS/UpdatePanelRenderModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode/VB/UpdatePanelRenderModeVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下属性返回`true`如果显式调用方法或者如果属性设置为。By default, the property returns `true` if the method was explicitly called or if the property is set to . 此属性应使用由控件开发人员想要扩展控件。This property is intended for use by control developers who want to extend the control. 例如，在派生类中，你可能会提供其他逻辑来确定是否应更新控件。For example, in derived classes, you might provide additional logic to determine whether an control should be updated.

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象包含以声明方式为 控件注册的 和 对象。

span.span: Gets an object that contains and objects that were registered declaratively for the control.

value.span: 类型为 和 的对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects of type and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取已为定义的所有触发器的集合控件。The property gets a collection of all the triggers that have been defined for the control. (您可以通过使用以声明方式定义触发器**UpdatePanelTrigger 集合编辑器**对话框，在设计器中或通过使用``元素的控件。)该集合包含和对象。(You can define triggers declaratively by using the **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box in the designer or by using the `` element of the control.) The collection includes and objects. 在中定义的声明性触发器集合不会跟踪视图状态中。Declarative triggers that are defined in the collection are not tracked in view state. 命名容器的控件用作触发器，其所有子控件引起回发将都用作触发器。When a control that is a naming container is used as a trigger, all its child controls that cause postback behave as triggers.

summary.span: 导致更新 控件的内容。

span.span: Causes an update of the content of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在调用时，为局部页面呈现启用页方法，在浏览器中更新控件的内容。If the page is enabled for partial-page rendering, when you invoke the method, the control's content is updated in the browser. 调用方法，如果必须确定所必须执行的服务器代码是否应更新控件。Call the method if you have server code that must execute to determine whether an control should be updated. 如果你打算使用方法，并将属性设置为。If you plan to use the method, set the property to . 如果你想更新服务器逻辑中的面板的决定，请确保属性是`false`并没有显式触发器定义面板。If you want the decision to update the panel in server logic, make sure that the property is `false` and that no explicit triggers are defined for the panel. 在典型的页面开发方案中，如果定义了触发器或者属性是`true`有关控件，在页生命周期内自动调用方法。In a typical page development scenario, if you define triggers or if the property is `true` for the control, the method is automatically called during the page life cycle. 如果属性未定义为控件，不会进行任何更新面板。If the property is not defined for the control, no updates of the panel will occur. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来更新的内容控制自上次更新时所经历时间超过五秒。The following example uses the method to update the content of an control when more than five seconds have elapsed since the last update. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/CS/UpdatePanelUpdateModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/VB/UpdatePanelUpdateModeVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: The property is set to .
\- or –

span.span: The method is called during or after the page's event.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示何时更新 控件的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates when an control's content is updated.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件不是在另一控件，面板中更新的设置根据和属性，以及触发器的集合。When an control is not inside another control, the panel is updated according to the settings of the and properties, together with the collection of triggers. 当控件位于另一个父面板会进行更新时，将自动更新控件，在子面板。When an control is inside another control, the child panel is automatically updated when the parent panel is updated. 内容在以下情况下更新控件：The content of an control is updated in the following circumstances: - 如果属性设置为，则上每个从页面上的任何位置执行回发时将更新控件的内容。If the property is set to , the control's content is updated on every postback that originates from anywhere on the page. 这包括从在其他控件的异步回发控件并不是内部的控件的回发控件。This includes asynchronous postbacks from controls that are inside other controls and postbacks from controls that are not inside controls. - 如果控件嵌套在另一个更新控件和父更新面板。If the control is nested inside another control and the parent update panel is updated. - 如果属性设置为，并出现以下情况之一：If the property is set to , and one of the following conditions occurs: - 在调用方法的显式控制。You call the method of the control explicitly. - 通过使用定义为触发器的控件导致回发属性的控件。The postback is caused by a control that is defined as a trigger by using the property of the control. 在此方案中，该控件显式触发面板内容的更新。In this scenario, the control explicitly triggers an update of the panel content. 该控件可以是内部或外部定义该触发器的控件。The control can be either inside or outside the control that defines the trigger. - 属性设置为`true`的子控件和控件导致回发。The property is set to `true` and a child control of the control causes a postback. 嵌套的子控件控件不会导致更新外部控件，除非它被显式定义为触发器。A child control of a nested control does not cause an update to the outer control unless it is explicitly defined as a trigger. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. 此示例声明两个控件。The example declares two controls. 在第一个面板中，属性设置为。In the first panel, the property is set to . 在第二个面板中，设置为。In the second panel, is set to . 这两个面板外部按钮注册为异步回发控件通过调用方法的控件。A button outside both panels is registered as an asynchronous postback control by calling the method of the control. 在按钮的`Click`事件处理程序如果其上次更新以来所经历时间超过五秒会调用方法的第一个面板。In the button's `Click` event handler, the method of the first panel is called if more than five seconds have elapsed since its last update. 在此方案中，仅当最后一个面板刷新已超过五秒更新面板的内容。In this scenario, the panel’s content is updated only if the last panel refresh was more than five seconds ago. 第二个面板的内容始终进行更新。The content of the second panel is always updated. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/CS/UpdatePanelUpdateModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/VB/UpdatePanelUpdateModeVB.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的类型不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified type is not one of the values.
